com.bm.jeu

Class RemotePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bm.jeu.RemotePlayer

  • public class RemotePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    BMagee This class is simply the struct for a player, it includes the player's 'stats' or characteristics, the player's sprite, and getter/setter methods for those stats. This class also contains methods directly related to the player itself. For example, methods that 'kill' the player, 'respawn' the player, etc. It's currently unclear if the getter/setter variables will have any use, given that generally these variables will be set in kill/respawn methods... If you're looking to create or load a player, check out the 'PlayerHandler' class. That class contains methods for creating a new player, etc.
